welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bremerton, a charming city known for its rich naval history and scenic waterfront. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all the unique attractions and experiences this beautiful city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Jimmy D's
restaurants.description: Jimmy D's is a american restaurant located in Bremerton.

restaurants.name: Big Apple Diner
restaurants.description: Big Apple Diner is a diner located in Bremerton.

restaurants.name: Juanitos Taqueria
restaurants.description: Juanitos Taqueria is a mexican restaurant located in Bremerton.

restaurants.name: Hot Java Cafe
restaurants.description: Hot Java Cafe is a café located in Bremerton.

restaurants.name: Tony's Italian Restaurant & Pizzeria
restaurants.description: Tony's Italian Restaurant & Pizzeria is a pizzeria located in Bremerton.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kenmore Air Harbor SPB Airport serves as the hub for all flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free public Wi-Fi network while waiting for their flights.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Industrial Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Industrial Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Seattle-Tacoma International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The North Satellite Terminal at Seattle-Tacoma International Airport serves domestic flights for Alaska Airlines and their partner airlines.

terminals.name: South Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The South Satellite Terminal at Seattle-Tacoma International Airport serves international flights for Delta Air Lines and their partner airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. A premium option is also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at McChord AFB Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at McChord AFB Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
